object.name: ChatPermissions
object.description: Describes actions that a non-administrator user is allowed to take in a chat.
object.html_description: Describes actions that a non-administrator user is allowed to take in a chat.
object.rst_description: Describes actions that a non-administrator user is allowed to take in a chat.

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to send text messages, contacts, invoices, locations and venues
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to send text messages, contacts, invoices, locations and venues
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to send text messages, contacts, invoices, locations and venues
annotations.name: can_send_messages

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to send audios
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to send audios
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to send audios
annotations.name: can_send_audios

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to send documents
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to send documents
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to send documents
annotations.name: can_send_documents

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to send photos
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to send photos
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to send photos
annotations.name: can_send_photos

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to send videos
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to send videos
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to send videos
annotations.name: can_send_videos

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to send video notes
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to send video notes
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to send video notes
annotations.name: can_send_video_notes

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to send voice notes
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to send voice notes
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to send voice notes
annotations.name: can_send_voice_notes

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to send polls
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to send polls
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to send polls
annotations.name: can_send_polls

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to send animations, games, stickers and use inline bots
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to send animations, games, stickers and use inline bots
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to send animations, games, stickers and use inline bots
annotations.name: can_send_other_messages

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to add web page previews to their messages
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to add web page previews to their messages
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to add web page previews to their messages
annotations.name: can_add_web_page_previews

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to change the chat title, photo and other settings. Ignored in public supergroups
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to change the chat title, photo and other settings. Ignored in public supergroups
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to change the chat title, photo and other settings. Ignored in public supergroups
annotations.name: can_change_info

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to invite new users to the chat
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to invite new users to the chat
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to invite new users to the chat
annotations.name: can_invite_users

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to pin messages. Ignored in public supergroups
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to pin messages. Ignored in public supergroups
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to pin messages. Ignored in public supergroups
annotations.name: can_pin_messages

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to create forum topics. If omitted defaults to the value of can_pin_messages
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to create forum topics. If omitted defaults to the value of can_pin_messages
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to create forum topics. If omitted defaults to the value of can_pin_messages
annotations.name: can_manage_topics
